pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Modeling Rate-Dependent Hysteretic Processes and Ellipses // Fit, summarize and plot sinusoidal hysteretic processes using: two-step simple harmonic least squares, ellipse-specific non-linear least squares, the direct method, geometric least squares or linear least squares. See Yang, F and A. Parkhurst, "Efficient Estimation of Elliptical Hysteresis with Application to the Characterization of Heat Stress" DOI:10.1007/s13253-015-0213-6.
